reporting-org.narrative: Bundesministerium für wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung (BMZ)
Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ)

title.narrative: Integrated rural Development to improve livelihoods amongst rural poor in Western Kenya
Integrierte Entwicklung und Selbsthilfestärkung in Westkenia, Fortführung

description.narrative: Integrated rural development and improvement of the livelihood of the rural population (about 30,000 people) in Westkenya. The focus here is on strengthening the self-organization and self-help potential of the population. Capacity-building measures in the areas of sustainable agriculture and natural resource mnagement are part of the strategy as is L / A engagement.

Integrierte ländliche Entwicklung und Verbesserung der Lebenslage der ländlichen Bevölkerung (ca 30.000 Menschen) in Westkenia. Im Fokus stehen hierbei die Stärkung der Selbstorganisation und des Selbsthilfepotentials der Bevölkerung. Kapazitätsbildungsmaßnahmen in den Bereichen standortgerechten Landbau und des natürlichen Ressourcenschutzes sind Teil Ansatz wie gezielte L/A-Arbeit.

Integrated rural development and improvement of the livelihood of the rural population (about 30,000 people) in Westkenya. The focus here is on strengthening the self-organization and self-help potential of the population. Capacity-building measures in the areas of sustainable agriculture and natural resource mnagement are part of the strategy as is L / A engagement.
